name: Emotional Repairer
description:
Emotional Repairer is a 2D puzzle game. In this game the player takes on the role of a child called Anna, a little angel with super powers. She is able to see relationships and repair broken ones. As a member of the family, Anna is always trying to keep the relationships between the family members together. Players will use anna's powers to decipher and help maintain the emotional bonds between family members. Some say it is blood ties that build a family, others say it is common interests that bind families together. In a child's perspective, however, the roots that extend the family are the love of the people. 

It is a group work from Global Game Jam 2023,

Molly: 2D artist, Music, Programmer

Vivian: 2D artist, Graphic designer

Clouddd: Game designer, 2D artist
